text: Raymond Monica is an American football coach and former player. He is the defensive line coach at the Southeastern Louisiana University in Hammond, Louisiana, a position he has held since 2019. Monica served as the head football coach at Kutztown University of Pennsylvania from 2006 to 2012 and Arkansas Tech University from 2013 to 2018. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Arkansas Tech Wonder Boys football coaches Category:Kutztown Golden Bears football coaches Category:North Alabama Lions football coaches Category:Southeastern Louisiana Lions football coaches Category:Temple Owls football coaches Category:Junior college football coaches in the United States Category:Junior college football players in the United States Category:University of North Alabama alumni
title: Raymond Monica
